import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Header from '../Header' import Footer from '../Footer' import Services from '../Services' import Steps from '../Steps' import Consultants from '../Consultants' import './home.sass' const Home = () => { return (

Manufacturing Turnarounds is an Operational Turnaround Consulting group. We specialize in turning around the operations of Manufacturers who have fallen out of favor with Lenders, Private Equity Sponsors, or Institutional Investors. While some clients prefer to reach out to us directly when they wish to improve operations, more often than not we are called upon by Banks, Restructuring Groups, or Individual Chief Restructuring Officers acting on behalf of their clients.

Work With Us

) } export default Home
